comprehensive_overview: Smoove is a structural variant caller for next-generation sequencing data, specializing in the detection of large deletions and duplications in genomes. It uses split-read alignments and discordant paired-end mappings to identify and genotype structural variants.
core_features:
1. Detection of large deletions and duplications
2. Utilizes split-read alignments
3. Uses discordant paired-end mappings
4. Genotyping of structural variants
